snippet: The referee Karl Hess, who had the former North Carolina State stars Steve Corchiani and Tom Gugliotta removed from the arena for complaining about calls on Feb. 18, said he did not want to be a distraction at the A.C.C. tournament.
abstract: The referee Karl Hess, who had the former North Carolina State stars Steve Corchiani and Tom Gugliotta removed from the arena for complaining about calls on Feb. 18, said he did not want to be a distraction at the A.C.C. tournament.

headline.main: Referee Steers Clear of A.C.C. Tournament
